numuth rakhel wandawa sitiyaya. 32 leya garbhiniwa putha්rayeku wada: swaminwahanse mage duka balu bawin mage purushaya ithin mata aadarewanneyayi kiya ohuta ruben yana nama thabuwaya. 33 nawatha aa garbhiniwa putha්rayeku wada: ma apa්riya karanu labu bawa swaminwahanse asu bawin me putha්rayath mata dunsekayi kiya ohuta simiyon yana namaya thabuwaya. 34 nawatha aa garbhiniwa putha්rayeku wada: ithin mage purushaya nisa putha්rayan thundeneku wadu bawin ohu me wathawe mata alumweyayi kiwaya.

karya bahula, eekakari watapitawakata saha ee samanga ma gatena awiweki jiwana ratawakata huru wu ayakuta, ee siyallangen ma midi apurwa wu nidahasak windimin, soba dahamata wadath samipa wa kalaya gatha karannata haki nam.gewaththen ma nela gath kisidu krushi rasayanikayakin thora elawalu palathuru wargawalin sakasu aaharawala rasa windinnata haki nam, aththen ma eya jiwithayata apurwa athdakimak wewi.mathale walawela sato niwadu nikethanaya me siyalu sonduru athdakim winda gatha haki thanak lesa handinwiya haki ya.akkara dahayaka bhumi pa්ramanayaka pihiti mehi palathuru, elawalu, kulubadu, beheth palati athulu shakawalin labena sewana kenaku ge sithata danawanne apuru suwayaki.ewan haritha uyanak thula athi sancharaka niwahane athulatha aththe da sobadahama samanga mana lesa baddha wana aakaraye nimawaki.
niwtoniya niyamayata anuwa ek anshuwak anek wasthu wisin aakarshanaya kereyi.

brithanyaye pamanak ek warshayak athulatha bhawithayen pasuwa bahara karanu labana bima bata pramanaya biliyana 8.5k pamana wana athara, eya erata werala pirisidu kirimwala di hamu wana pradhana apadrawya dahayen ekak da weyi.

nangenahira palathe aarakshaka sewawange pramanaya siyayata 26 kin adukara atha.uthure bimbomba iwath kirima siyayata 96 kin nimakara athi athara uthuru nangenahira ithiriwa sitina awathan pawul 7094 k kadinamin padinchi karawimata katayuthu yodagena yana bawa da lekamwaraya kiya.wasara 2010 sita 2012 dakwa rajaya laba di athi wandi sahana pramanaya koti 38 ki. 2013 wasare laba di athi wandi sahana pramanaya rupiyal koti 20 kayi rajaya kiyayi.yuda samaye pawathi aaraksha kalapa iwath kere.
eewa athara pahatha sandahan de athulathwa thibe.
api dannawa apita abhiyogayak thiyenawa.

ee anuwa slowakiyawa, maladiwayina, nawasilanthaya wani ratawalata apanayanaya kirime awasthawa me wanawita udawi athi bawada sadahan karana ladi.pradarshanayen pasu slowakiyawa ta sampal anawumak yawa athi bawath polanthaya wethada apanayana anawumak labi athi bawath ohu wadiduratath pawasiya.
